name: Underground Dungeon
description:
Get away from the devil's nightlife.
Gather magic stones and fight to become stronger.
But don't be vigilant.
Make the most of every moment.

* Turn-based retro roguelite underground dungeon
Feel the retro sensibility!
You cannot be vigilant from the moment of choice.
Complete various combinations with various abilities.

* Numerous jobs
There are various engravings.
You have to attack differently depending on the engraving.
Some engravings are easy and some engravings are difficult.
Try attacking all the engravings!

* Numerous skills and equipment
In the underground dungeon, there are skill gems, equipment gems, and items.
Collect and create various combinations according to your engraving!

* Infinite Underground
Clearing the 13th floor will open the infinite basement.
Test how far you can go!

* Counterattack!
If certain conditions are met, you can go to the final battle with the Demon King.
Defeat the Demon King!
